message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. $120 is a bit steep for me.  I'm interested in the product but I'm only able to offer $85 right now. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer you the product for $105.
Alice, $105 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  How about $95?  That would be a good compromise for both of us.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $100, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. What do you think?
